summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ARRIS Historical Learning Visualization feature. All 25 backend tests passed. Frontend UI correctly renders ArrisLearningHistory component for Premium users with all 4 tabs (Snapshot, Milestones, Growth, Comparison) working. Pro users see upgrade prompt instead of the component.
passed_tests: Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-snapshot requires authentication (401/403)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-snapshot returns data for Pro users with limited patterns (max 3)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-snapshot returns upgrade_prompt for non-Premium users
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-snapshot returns full data for Premium users (is_premium=true)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-snapshot health_score has correct structure (score, status, message, recommendation, breakdown)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-snapshot learning_metrics has correct structure (total_predictions, accurate_predictions, accuracy_rate, learning_stage, stage_description)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-snapshot memory_summary has correct structure (total_memories, by_type)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-timeline requires authentication (401/403)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-timeline returns 403 for Pro users (feature_gated)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-timeline returns data for Premium users
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-timeline respects date_range parameter (7d, 30d, 90d, 1y, all)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-comparison requires authentication (401/403)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-comparison returns 403 for Pro users (feature_gated)
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-comparison returns data for Premium users
Backend: GET /api/arris/learning-comparison respects period parameters (period1, period2)
Backend: GET /api/arris/growth-chart requires authentication (401/403)
Backend: GET /api/arris/growth-chart returns 403 for Pro users (feature_gated)
Backend: GET /api/arris/growth-chart returns data for Premium users
Backend: GET /api/arris/growth-chart respects metric parameter (memories, patterns, accuracy, interactions)
Backend: GET /api/arris/growth-chart respects granularity parameter (daily, weekly, monthly)
Backend: GET /api/arris/milestones requires authentication (401/403)
Backend: GET /api/arris/milestones returns data for Pro users (available to all)
Backend: GET /api/arris/milestones returns data for Premium users with milestone structure
Backend: Snapshot and milestones return consistent creator_id
Backend: Health score calculation is correct (sum of breakdown components)
Frontend: Pro user sees 'Upgrade to Premium' prompt in Premium Analytics tab
Frontend: Pro user does NOT see ArrisLearningHistory component (correct gating)
Frontend: Premium user sees ArrisLearningHistory component with Premium badge
Frontend: Snapshot tab shows health score indicator with score breakdown (Memory/Pattern/Accuracy)
Frontend: Snapshot tab shows learning stage display with predictions and accuracy rate
Frontend: Snapshot tab shows memory summary with total memories and by_type breakdown
Frontend: Snapshot tab shows active patterns with category colors (SUCCESS, COMPLEXITY, RISK)
Frontend: Milestones tab shows timeline with First Memory Created, First Pattern Detected, 10 Memories milestones
Frontend: Growth tab shows area chart with memory growth over time
Frontend: Growth tab has dropdown selectors for metric (Memories/Patterns/Accuracy/Interactions) and granularity (Daily/Weekly/Monthly)
Frontend: Comparison tab shows period comparison with Memories, Patterns, Accuracy, Interactions metrics
Frontend: Comparison tab shows percentage changes and 'Learning is Improving!' badge
critical_code_review_comments: ArrisHistoricalService correctly implements all required methods (get_learning_timeline, get_comparative_analysis, get_learning_snapshot, get_growth_chart_data)
Feature gating properly implemented using feature_gating.has_advanced_analytics() for Premium-only endpoints
Learning snapshot correctly limits data for non-Premium users (max 3 patterns, max 5 recent activities)
Health score calculation correctly sums memory_score (max 40), pattern_score (max 30), accuracy_score (max 30)
Frontend ArrisLearningHistory component properly handles hasPremiumAccess prop for tab disabling
data-testid attributes present on key elements (arris-learning-history, tab-snapshot, tab-milestones, tab-growth, tab-comparison, health-score, learning-stage, milestones-timeline, comparison-card)
Recharts integration working correctly for GrowthChart component with AreaChart and Line
Pattern cards display with correct category colors (success=green, risk=red, timing=blue, complexity=purple, platform=amber)
seed_data_creation: Test data was seeded by main agent - Premium creator has 20 memories, 5 patterns, 7 outcomes with 71% accuracy
context_for_next_testing_agent: ARRIS Historical Learning Visualization feature fully tested. Endpoints: /api/arris/learning-snapshot (all users, limited for non-Premium), /api/arris/learning-timeline (Premium only), /api/arris/learning-comparison (Premium only), /api/arris/growth-chart (Premium only), /api/arris/milestones (all users). Frontend ArrisLearningHistory component integrated in Premium Analytics tab of CreatorDashboard after ArrisActivityFeed. Component has 4 tabs: Snapshot (health score, learning stage, memory summary, active patterns), Milestones (timeline of achievements), Growth (charts with metric/granularity selectors), Comparison (period comparison with trend indicator). Pro users see upgrade prompt instead of the component.
